WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
 
I am trying to install the Client Profile Designer tool but it is not installing on my machine. It starts extracting and then disappears. I know that this kind of info will not help much for you to debug. Please tell me what to send you (log files etc) and I will do so.
 
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Client Profile Designer tool not installing

Comments.Message:
Hi there, I extracted the setup exe and ran the client profile setup and got this exception

System.IO.FileLoadException was unhandled
Message: Could not load file or assembly 'cpdesign, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' or one of its dependencies. Strong name validation failed. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8013141A)

any ideas?

Hi marlongrech,

We discovered an issue with the signing of the binaries and are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Apologies for the inconvenience.

Thanks,
-Bart

We have addressed this issue with the package and posted a new package last week. If you have any other issues, please let us know. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks,
-Troy
